API Reference
=============

Core dartwork-mpl utilities are grouped by topic to mirror the main usage flow:
apply a style, lay out the figure, pick colors and fonts, then export or inspect
assets. Each section below links to functions and classes you can import
directly from `dartwork_mpl`.

.. toctree::

   :titlesonly:

   Style Management <style>
   Layout Utilities <layout>
   Color Utilities <color>
   Font Utilities <font>
   File I/O <io>
   Visualization Tools <visualization>
